title: JASHN THE BANQUET
description: Our premier banquet hall perfect for intimate celebrations and business gatherings with elegant ambiance and modern amenities.
listDescription: Perfect for birthday parties, rokha ceremonies, engagements, kitty parties, and small corporate meetings in an elegant setting.
detailDescription:
JASHN THE BANQUET offers a sophisticated 3,000 sq. ft. venue designed for intimate celebrations and professional gatherings. With a capacity of 150+ guests, this elegantly appointed hall provides the perfect backdrop for memorable events.

Ideal for birthday celebrations, rokha ceremonies, engagements, kitty parties, and small business meetings, the venue features modern amenities including centralized AC, JBL sound systems, and dedicated buffet counters. The accessible entry ensures comfort for all guests, while ample parking accommodates 300+ vehicles. Our professional event team ensures seamless execution of your special occasions.
importantNotes: Liquor is not allowed without a Single Day Liquor License
Liquor can only be accessed with a valid Single Day Liquor License

title: BLANCO THE POOL SIDE
description: Experience magical celebrations by the largest pool in town, featuring lush greenery and beautiful fountains for unforgettable events.
listDescription: Perfect for wedding carnivals, haldi, mehndi, engagements, and floating phera ceremonies with the largest pool in town.
detailDescription:
BLANCO THE POOL SIDE transforms celebrations into magical experiences with its stunning 30,000 sq. ft. venue featuring the largest pool in town. The 5,300 sq. ft. pool area, complete with a separate kids' pool section, creates a breathtaking backdrop for ceremonies.

Perfect for wedding carnivals, haldi, mehndi, engagements, and the unique experience of floating phera mandaps, this venue offers both grand banquet and semi-banquet settings. With lush greenery, beautiful planters, and elegant fountains, guests can enjoy food and celebrations right by the water. The venue accommodates 500+ guests and features premium amenities including a 500 sq. ft. LED screen, pre-function areas, and separate bar counters.
importantNotes: Liquor is not allowed without a Single Day Liquor License
Liquor can only be accessed with a valid Single Day Liquor License

title: CP BANQUET AND CONVENTION
description: The first and biggest banquet of the town, perfect for lavish weddings, grand receptions, and major celebrations in any season.
listDescription: Ideal for grand weddings, receptions, birthdays, and rainy season celebrations in the town's largest banquet hall.
detailDescription:
CP BANQUET AND CONVENTION stands as the town's premier and largest banquet facility, offering 10,000 sq. ft. of elegantly designed space for the most lavish celebrations. As the first major banquet in the area, it sets the standard for grand events with its sophisticated ambiance and comprehensive facilities.

Perfect for grand weddings, receptions, significant birthdays, and especially ideal for rainy season celebrations when you want your wedding to maintain its lavish appeal indoors. The venue features luxurious carpet flooring, ample pre-function areas, and professional event support to ensure your celebration is executed flawlessly regardless of weather conditions.
importantNotes: Liquor is not allowed without a Single Day Liquor License
Liquor can only be accessed with a valid Single Day Liquor License

title: DELIBERATION MEETING HALL
description: Professional meeting space perfect for board meetings, corporate discussions, and intimate gatherings with focused ambiance.
listDescription: Ideal for board meetings, small kitty parties, and intimate gatherings in a professional and comfortable setting.
detailDescription:
The DELIBERATION MEETING HALL provides a professional 900 sq. ft. space designed for focused discussions and intimate gatherings. With a capacity for 40+ guests, this venue offers the perfect environment for productive meetings and small social events.

Specifically designed for board meetings, corporate discussions, small kitty parties, and intimate gatherings, the hall features all necessary amenities for a seamless experience. The comfortable setting with centralized climate control ensures productive sessions, while the available buffet counters and lounge areas facilitate networking and refreshment breaks.
importantNotes: Liquor is not allowed without a Single Day Liquor License
Liquor can only be accessed with a valid Single Day Liquor License

title: THE VELVET ROOM
description: Sophisticated space designed for after-parties, kitty gatherings, and elegant social events with luxurious ambiance.
listDescription: Perfect for after-parties, kitty gatherings, and elegant social events in a sophisticated and comfortable setting.
detailDescription:
THE VELVET ROOM offers 1,800 sq. ft. of sophisticated space specifically designed for elegant after-parties and social gatherings. With a capacity for 100+ guests, this venue provides the perfect intimate setting for post-event celebrations and kitty parties.

Featuring a luxurious ambiance with comfortable lounge areas and pre-function spaces, The Velvet Room creates the ideal atmosphere for relaxed socializing and celebration. The centralized climate control ensures comfort throughout your event, while the separate buffet counters allow for elegant food service arrangements.
importantNotes: Liquor is not allowed without a Single Day Liquor License
Liquor can only be accessed with a valid Single Day Liquor License

title: LOST AND FOUND CLUB
description: Dynamic party venue with built-in JBL sound system, attractive lighting, and dance floor for high-energy celebrations.
listDescription: Perfect for after-parties, freshers, farewells, birthday parties with built-in JBL sound system and party lighting.
detailDescription:
LOST AND FOUND CLUB is a 6,500 sq. ft. premium party venue designed for high-energy celebrations and unforgettable nights. With capacity for 250+ guests, this club-style space features built-in JBL sound systems, dynamic party lighting, and dedicated dance floors to create the perfect party atmosphere.

Ideal for after-parties, freshers' events, farewell celebrations, and themed birthday parties, the club is fully loaded with attractive lighting systems that make every event more engaging and perfect. The carpet flooring, centralized AC, and separate bar counter ensure comfort and convenience throughout your celebration.
importantNotes: Liquor is not allowed without a Single Day Liquor License
Liquor can only be accessed with a valid Single Day Liquor License
